org.dejava.component.faces.exception

Class AbstractExceptionHandlerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.faces.context.ExceptionHandlerFactory
      • org.dejava.component.faces.exception.AbstractExceptionHandlerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.faces.FacesWrapper<javax.faces.context.ExceptionHandlerFactory>

    public abstract class AbstractExceptionHandlerFactory
extends javax.faces.context.ExceptionHandlerFactory
    The exception handler factory for the applications. The factory must be annotated with the qualifiers to get the correct AbstractLocaleController bean instance.
